Application_Process: Application  form is available at District Social Welfare Office      Applicant must fill form and  submit to District Social Welfare Office
Contact_Office: Assistant   Commissioner, District Social Welfare Office
Scheme_Objective: The main object of the  Corporation is to implement various schemes to uplift lifestyle of  Charmakars (Dhor, Chambhar, Holar,Mochi etc.) who are economically  weak and below poverty line and with an intention to develop them  educationally, economically and socially so as to give them  respectable place in Society. Also production of various types of  Footwear & Leather Articles & supply to Government  Departments & sale in Open Market.

Application_Process: Application in prescribed format attached with necessary documents.
Contact_Office: District Social Welfare Office ,Zillah Parishad & Assistant Commissioner Social Welfare Office ,Mumbai Urban & Mumbai Suburban
Scheme_Name: Financial Assistance to Self-Employment for Trained Disabled Persons
Scheme_Objective: Financial assistance to facilitate purchase of equipment for those disable persons who are completing vocational training from government institutions or recognize institution to start their own business.

Application_Process: Application has to be submitted to Assistant Commissioner, District Social welfare office.
Contact_Office: Assistant Commissioner, Social Welfare  District Office
Scheme_Name: Providing Mini tractor and its sub parts to the Self Help Group of Scheduled Castes
Scheme_Objective: In order to improve the financial condition of the scheduled castes and Nav-Buddhists Self Help Group.

Application_Process: Application has to be submitted to Textile department, Govt. of Maharashtra. After approval and sanction of share capital. Then application should be submitted to Assistant Commissioner, Social Welfare District Office. Social welfare department sanction 50 % loan to these spinning mills.
Contact_Office: Assistant Commissioner, Social Welfare  District Office
Scheme_Name: Long Term-Loan to SC Co-op Spinning Mills under Special Component Plan
Scheme_Objective: To promote the spinning mills of scheduled caste members

Application_Process: Caste Certificate and Income Certificate given by eligible authority.     Detailed information related to the scheme, under that availability of raw material, sale of final product. In short, need to submit project report.     Attested copy of the Certificate, if applicant has taken any technical training.     Rent receipt / Agreement letter copy / Ownership proof of the place where applicant wants to commerce their business.  Proof of earlier business experience, if any.    Attested copy of Ration Card.     While applying for auto rickshaw, copy of Driving License and RTO License are necessary to submit.     Proof of Number plate and auto rickshaw booking copy from the dealer should be submitted for applying for finance of auto rickshaw.     Proof/s of eligibility of the 2 guarantor- E.g. 7/12 Utara, etc.     It is compulsory for the beneficiary to use the loan amount only for the loan amount only for the proposed business/occupation on the basis of submitted project report.     It is mandatory to fill all the columns of the application form without any overwriting and have to present 2 copies by the applicant. Attach passport size photographs on both application forms.  Note – While submitting the loan application original documents to be needed for verification.
Contact_Office: Vasantrao Naik Vimukta Jatis And Nomadic Tribes Development Corporation (Limited) Head Office : 1st Floor, Juhu Supreme Shopping Centre, Gulmohar Cross Road No.9, J.V.P.D. Scheme (North), Vile Parle (West), Mumbai – 400 049. Telephone: 022 – 2620 2586 / 2620 2588. E-mail: vnvjntdc@gmail.com
Scheme_Name: 25% Margin Money Loan Scheme.    Rs. 25,000/- Direct Loan Scheme.
Scheme_Objective: Provide loan on nominal rate of interest to the economically weak people who belongs to Vimukta Jatis (Denotified Tribes), Nomadic Tribes and Special Backward Class for their financial, educational and social upliftment.

Application_Process: Application has to be submitted to Assistant Commissioner, District Social welfare office.
Contact_Office: Assistant Commissioner, Social Welfare  District Office
Scheme_Name: Providing Tin stalls to Gatai Kamgar
Scheme_Objective: This scheme is meant for the social and economic upliftment of SC Persons who are involved in the Leather footwear work and preparing of leather goods and to protect them from heat, rain and wind.

Application_Process: Application has to be submitted to Assistant Commissioner, District Social welfare office.
